# Contributing

**The issue tracker is only for bug reports and enhancement suggestions. If you have a question, please ask it in the [Discord server](https://discord.gg/zs2fNKa) instead of opening an issue â€“ you will get redirected there anyway.**

If you wish to contribute to the ribbon codebase or documentation, feel free to fork the repository and submit a pull request.

## Setup
To get ready to work on the codebase, please do the following:

1. Fork & clone the repository, and make sure you're on the **master** branch
2. Run `npm install`
3. Code your heart out!
4. [Submit a pull request](https://github.com/favna/ribbon/compare)
